title: Second Round of Seed Sale
body:
It has been requested by several members in the BNFYOfficial Telegram group that we conduct a second round of seed sale for BNFY prior to the launch of the presale on BSCStarter. We are creating this proposal to allow the community to decide if this should happen or not. This proposal will be open over the weekend from Friday 3/12/21, 00:00 to Sunday 3/14/21, 23:59. 
You must connect with the wallet that holds BNFY tokens to vote. 

If approved, we would open another round on Bounce.finance for an additional 2,500 BNFY to raise another 50 BNB at the same price as the first round: 1 BNB : 50 BNFY (0.02 BNB : 1 BNFY). The round will last 5 days from Monday-Friday (3/15-3/19/21) and will be on a first come first serve basis. There will be no marketing or promotion for this round as we will be focusing all efforts on promoting the presale on BSCStarter.

The funds will be used for: 
1. Marketing and promotion of the BSCStarter presale and the project in general.
2. Smart contract audit(s) by professional Solidity security firm(s).
3. KYC of the team behind the project.
4. Speed up and improve the development of the platform for a swift and smooth launch with no bugs or issues.

Those in favor vote yes. Those against vote no.
author: 0x4dbFF4018771552f3914f17CA822bb0F3B452e29
